successes.title: Pono Music - Where Your Soul Rediscovers Music
successes.description: Pono's mission is to provide the best possible listening experience of your favorite digital music.

Pledges.description: LOVE + THANKS – That's what we feel for your pledge + a Thank You on our website – www.ponomusic.com – for helping us revive the soul of music!

PONOMUSIC FOUNDERS CLUB – Welcome to the club! Get sneak-peek product updates and awesome Kickstarter-exclusive swag – a PonoMusic Sticker + T-shirt – to show off your undying support to the PonoMusic revolution. Sizes S, M, L, XL. Plus: All the above.
NEIL YOUNG SIGNED POSTER – Get a signed 18X24 Poster from Neil Young's Carnegie Hall show. Plus: All the above.
EARLY BIRD – With this Early Bird special, get one First Edition Black PonoPlayer. Savings of $199 off $399 retail value. Plus: Website Thanks.
BLACK PONOPLAYER – First Edition. Savings of $99 off $399 retail value. Plus: Website Thanks.
YELLOW PONOPLAYER – First Edition. Savings of $99 off $399 retail value. Plus: Website Thanks.
YELLOW PONOPLAYER – First Edition. Savings of $99 off $399 retail value. Plus: Website Thanks.
BLACK PONOPLAYER – First Edition. Savings of $99 off $399 retail value. Plus: Website Thanks.

VIP DINNER & LISTENING PARTY WITH NEIL YOUNG – 1 Artist Signature Series PonoPlayer. Individual VIP dinner invitation & PonoMusic listening party hosted by Neil Young.  One overnight stay at Half Moon Bay Ritz Carlton. (Travel not included) Plus:  Website recognition and Thanks.

VIP DINNER & LISTENING PARTY WITH NEIL YOUNG: NEW YORK– 1 Artist Signature Series PonoPlayer. Individual VIP dinner invitation & PonoMusic listening party hosted by Neil Young in New York. One overnight stay at a New York hotel. (Travel not included) Plus: Website recognition and Thanks.
